## Presentations

### Conference posters

```{r}
#| results: asis
read_excel(path, sheet = "presentations") %>%
  filter(grepl("Poster", type)) %>%
  arrange(-year) %>%
  rowid_to_column() %>%
  mutate(posters = glue("{rowid}. {names} {title}. {event}, {location}. {date}.")) %>%
  pull(posters)
```

### Guest Lectures

```{r}
#| results: asis
read_excel(path, sheet = "presentations") %>%
  filter(grepl("Guest", type)) %>%
  arrange(-year) %>%
  rowid_to_column() %>%
  mutate(guest_lectures = glue("{rowid}. {names} {title}. {event}, {location}. {date}.")) %>%
  pull(guest_lectures)
```
